Product Info.Product Description: Delicious chunks of tart Michigan apples blanketed in a silky, sweet glaze and wrapped in buttery pastry layers. This classic flavor has been a fan favorite for years and makes an irresistible breakfast, dessert, or holiday treat.
Product Info.Storage Instructions: Keep frozen until ready to use. Do not refreeze once thawed.
Product Info.Baking Instructions: Thaw at room temperature for 8–12 hours or overnight until dough doubles in size. Preheat oven to 325°F. Bake for 25–30 minutes or until golden brown. Drizzle with included icing packet after baking.
Product Info.Ingredients: Filling: Apples, Sugar, Modified Corn Starch, Natural Flavors, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Salt. Dough: Enriched Wheat Flour (Wheat Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Palm Oil, Water, Yeast, Sugar, Whey (Milk), Salt, Dextrose, Soy Flour, Nonfat Dry Milk, Mono- and Diglycerides, Natural Flavors, Enzymes.
Product Info.Allergens: Contains: Wheat, Milk, Soy. Produced in a facility that processes nuts.
Product Info.Nutrition Facts: Calories: 150; Total Fat: 4.5g (6%) – Saturated Fat: 3g (14%); Trans Fat: 0g; Cholesterol: 25mg (9%); Sodium: 160mg (7%); Carbs: 25g (9%) – Fiber: <1g (2%), Sugars: 10g (Includes 8g Added Sugars – 17%); Protein: 4g; Vitamin D: 0.1mcg (0%), Calcium: 20mg (2%), Iron: 1mg (6%), Potassium: 60mg (2%)

Product Info.Product Description: A savory twist on the classic Butter Braid® pastry. This flavor blends mozzarella, provolone, cheddar, and Neufchâtel cheeses with a delicious herb seasoning, all wrapped in buttery layers of pastry dough. Ideal as an appetizer, snack, or savory brunch option.
Product Info.Storage Instructions: Keep frozen until you’re ready to bake. Do not refreeze after thawing.
Product Info.Baking Instructions: Thaw at room temperature for 8–12 hours (until dough doubles in size). Preheat oven to 325°F. Bake for 25–30 minutes until golden brown. No icing needed for this savory pastry.

Product Info.Product Description: Soft, spiraled rolls filled with cinnamon sugar and topped with a rich caramel glaze. This indulgent pastry is easy to prepare and delivers gooey, melt-in-your-mouth satisfaction—perfect for breakfast or dessert.
Product Info.Serving Size / Net Weight: 1 tray contains 9 caramel rolls; Serving Size: 2.5 oz (72g) – 9 servings
Product Info.Storage Instructions: Keep frozen until ready to use. Do not refreeze after thawing.
Product Info.Baking Instructions: Let thaw and rise in pan for 8–12 hours at room temperature (until rolls have doubled in size). Preheat oven to 325°F. Bake 25–30 minutes or until golden brown. Pour included caramel glaze over rolls while warm.

FAQs.Question: How do I obtain allergen information about your products?
FAQs.Answer: All major allergens are listed on the back of each flavor package and also on the Products page under each flavor. Butter Braid® products do not contain nuts but are produced in a facility that processes nuts.

FAQs.Question: Where can I find nutritional data or the ingredient list for a product?
FAQs.Answer: The best information is on the product packaging. You can also click the desired flavor on the Products page of the website to view nutrition facts and ingredient lists.

FAQs.Question: Do Butter Braid® products contain bioengineered ingredients?
FAQs.Answer: Yes. They contain bioengineered ingredients. For more details, refer to the USDA fact sheet included on packaging.

FAQs.Question: Are Butter Braid® products sold in retail stores?
FAQs.Answer: No. They are available exclusively through fundraising channels and not sold in retail stores.

FAQs.Question: How should I store my pastries?
FAQs.Answer: Keep them frozen until you’re ready to bake.

FAQs.Question: How long can Butter Braid® pastries stay out of the freezer?
FAQs.Answer: They can remain out for a short time. If they've begun rising (expanding), they should not be refrozen, as refreezing will impact performance — though it’s safe, it won’t bake correctly.

FAQs.Question: How should I prepare and bake my Butter Braid® products?
FAQs.Answer: Baking instructions are provided on each flavor's page in the Products section, just click the flavor you plan to bake.

FAQs.Question: How many people will my Butter Braid® pastry serve?
FAQs.Answer: A standard braided pastry (≈22 oz) yields eleven 2 oz FDA-recommended servings.
